code: import initalState from'./initialState';export var reducerMenu=function reducerMenu(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initalState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'CHANGE_MENU':return Object.assign({},state,{selected:action.payload.selected,isMobileMenu:false});case'OPEN_MOBILE_MENU':return Object.assign({},state,{isMobileMenu:true});case'CLOSE_MOBILE_MENU':return Object.assign({},state,{isMobileMenu:false});default:return state;}};
